Reviews.Title: Rechargable battery kit
Reviews.Author: Ken Hughes
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with the value of this multiple part kit.  It has many items needed to keep me truly mobile with my new Pentax K-30 DSLR camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement D-Li109 Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + SDHC Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Pentax K-r and Pentax K-30 Digital SLR Cameras and Pentax D-Li109
